channel.title: Age of Mythology
channel.description:
[center][u]Age of Mythology.[/u][/center]
This game is amazing. It's really old, I think the original was released in 2002, and then the expansion pack (Age of Mythology:The Titans) was released in 2004 or 2005. There are lots of videos of this game on YouTube, so check it out if you wanna.
It's a strategy game, and the creators of Age of Empire made it. I wouldn't like to call it a true strategy game, since the biggest strategy whilst fighting the computer or other players is upgrade and attack. You can give units different formations to move around in-making their attack/defence more effective, although there isn't much point since normal formations are just as good.
It has great online and the campaign is simply brilliant. If you wanna buy it, then I suggest you should. Take my word for it. It's cheap anyway, since it's old.
Discuss.

item.title: Age of Mythology
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

lordslayer565:

I’ve played the demo before, was a lot of fun. Hmm… I think I might download a torrent for it.

I never knew there was a demo… but yeah you should seriously get it. I got it as a birthday present long ago, probably wouldn’t have found it if I hadn’t got it then.

item.title: Age of Mythology
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

billygotshot:

Awesome game played it for a while. Still like it but i never got around to getting it lol. Played the trial for a while.

Eye konkur.

Exception:

Beat it in a week, never played it since. AOE3 pls.

Finishing the campaign is nothing, try online and playing the computer or even spending time in Edit mode. It’s x2 as fun.

Miss Silabsoft:

zues and pharaoh where much better games from what time.

I’ve never heard of those games. So…
